name: Pacman with Doors
description:
Fill in both your Prolific ID and press ENTER

CONTROL PACMAN USING THE ARROW KEYS

Collect as many dots as you can. Avoid the ghosts!

Each game round lasts 30 seconds, or until you are eaten by a ghost!

At the end of the game, each player is requested to complete the debriefing survey Please use the button in the game to submit the survey and complete the study
